rightHandHelpText.value: Move hands up and down to maintain the mystery challenge ratio.

bothHandsHelpText.value: Use W and S keys to move left hand, and Up and Down Arrow keys to move right hand. Move both hands at the same time to maintain the challenge ratio.

helpText.value: Choose how you see or hear your guided exploration.

lockRatioHelpText.value: When at challenge ratio, move hands as a single unit with the ratio locked.

homeScreenDescription.value: Choose set challenges to explore ratio and proportion.

introParagraph.value: In the Play Area you have two movable hands and a set of ratio challenges to discover. Hands can be moved up and down individually or simultaneously to discover multiple places where the chosen ratio challenge is true. There are options to add plain or numbered tick marks shown as evenly-spaced horizontal lines that divide up the vertical space of the Play Area. The Control Area has a button to reset the sim.

interactionHint.value: Move hands individually or at the same time to maintain the ratio challenge.

qualitativeStateOfSim.value: Currently, hands are {{ratioFitness}} the {{currentChallenge}} ratio with

challengesHelpText.value: Choose a ratio challenge to discover.

homeScreenDescription.value: Create custom challenges to explore ratio and proportion.

introParagraph.value: On this screen you can create your own ratio challenge. The Play Area has two movable hands that can be moved freely individually or simultaneously, or as a single interaction with the ratio locked to explore the ratio challenges you create. There are options to add plain or numbered tick marks shown as evenly-spaced horizontal lines that divide up the vertical space of the Play Area. In addition, you can increase the range of tick marks for a finer exploration of your ratio challenges. The Control Area has a button to reset the sim.

interactionHint.value: Explore the current my challenge ratio or create your own.

qualitativeStateOfSim.value: Currently, {{ratioFitness}} the my challenge ratio with

gridRangeHelpText.value: When tick marks shown, choose range for tick marks.

myChallengeHelpText.value: Set left hand and right hand values to create your custom ratio challenge.
